name: Hopeless Henry and the Unhelpful Hosts
name_original: Hopeless Henry and the Unhelpful Hosts
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

• Move Henry around the house by clicking on objects and people.

• Talk to people by pressing spacebar once you've walked over to them.

• Most interactive objects are marked with name tags, some of which you can pick up.

• Always observe your surroundings, and help Henry get to the party!
